title: Game crash then loss
body:
game crashed,process still runing,cant task kill or force it to close
so i had to logout and login windows again to get rid of LeagueOflegends.exe
then when i reconect(was like 15 seconds) game was not found and match history says its a loss

replies.body: What game mode was this, or champion you were playing?  Is it under the account you are posting from?  Unfortunately, I wasn't able to see anything out of the ordinary here.  :/  Let me know!

normal 5v5 blind pick
it happend a lot lately the game crashes and the process is still runing on background
cant use task manager nor command promp to kill League of legeds . exe
when i try to reopen if that is runing game doesnt launch
so i have to logoff windows and relogin to get rid of it then reconect
thats the match
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2265165219/234404311,we were wining and pushing mid,game crashed then when i reconected said game not found
